content: कुमुदः, --दं [कौ मोदते इति कुमुदं] {@--1@} The white water-lily said to open at moon-rise; नोच्छ्वसिति तपनकिरणैश्चंद्रस्येवाशुभिः कुमुदं <ls>V. 3. 16</ls>; so <ls>Ś. 5. 28</ls>; <ls>Rs. 3. 2</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 3.">21</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 3.">23</ls>; <ls>Me. 40.</ls> {@--2@} A red lotus. --दं Silver. --दः {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the elephant supposed to guard the south. {@--3@} Camphor. {@--4@} A species of monkey. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Nāga who gave his younger sister कुमुद्वती to Kuśa, son of Rāma; see <ls>R. 16. 79.</ls> <ls n="R. 16.">86.</ls>

कुमुदः, --दं [कौ मोदते इति कुमुदं] {@--1@} The white water-lily said to open at moon-rise; नोच्छ्वसिति तपनकिरणैश्चंद्रस्येवाशुभिः कुमुदं <ls>V. 3. 16</ls>; so <ls>Ś. 5. 28</ls>; <ls>Rs. 3. 2</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 3.">21</ls>, <ls n="Rs. 3.">23</ls>; <ls>Me. 40.</ls> {@--2@} A red lotus. --दं Silver. --दः {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the elephant supposed to guard the south. {@--3@} Camphor. {@--4@} A species of monkey. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Nāga who gave his younger sister कुमुद्वती to Kuśa, son of Rāma; see <ls>R. 16. 79.</ls> <ls n="R. 16.">86.</ls>
